sense.def:
Kadar neka dejavnost
involves something
, je tista stvar vključena ali uporabljena pri njej.

seg.quote: Some of the experiments involve the equipment you've seen.
Caring for a one-year-old involves changing nappies.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
involves someone
, nekoga zadeva ali vpliva nanj.

seg.quote: Workers are never told about things which involve them.

sense.def:
To involve oneself in something
pomeni sodelovati pri nečem.

seg.quote: They involve themselves deeply in community affairs.

sense.def:
To involve someone in something
pomeni pripraviti nekoga, da pri nečem sodeluje.

seg.quote: Did you have to involve me in this?
